channel.title: SyntheX PK - Ultimate RS Emulator [PK Server AND Economy Server]
channel.description:
[ul][list][CENTER][IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/synthexbanner.gif[/img]
[B]What makes SyntheX PK unique?[/B] SyntheX PK is both an Economy and PK based server. The server was last known as HydraScape and is managed and owned by Danny. Every skill is working except farming and agility. These skills will be released in the near future. There is all sorts of minigames that you can try out and earn rewards from, plus a never before seen home area. Hydrascape was once the most played RSPS, with nearly 400+ people on regulary at all times throughout the day, and at night. New on SyntheX PK is an all new skilling point reward system. For each skill you train, you will gain points. You can spend these points on various items, including a mystery box. The mystery box can give out a rare item if your lucky. All in all, the server has a decent xp rate, not to quick, and not to slow. Remember the game should be a challenge, and if you just want to get those quick stats to 99, choose PK Mode!
SyntheX PK also has a wonderful staff. They are always willing to help out with updates, and are great at communicating with the community. They are fairly active and put players who need help, first.
[IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/admin.gif[/img]Danny [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/admin.gif[/img]Tazo [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/admin.gif[/img]Totts [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/admin.gif[/img]Matt [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/mdoer.gif[/img]Rage Inside
[B]PK Mode and Adventurer Mode[/B] When you first create an account on SyntheX PK, you are required to decide between two different modes. PK Mode is for people who love to PK. You will be able to train your combat skills at a faster rate then you would in Adventurer mode. Your skills are not recorded on the highscores. When you select Adventurer mode, you're stats will be saved to the highscores, and it is more of a challenge to train your skills. Some skills are easy, others are more difficult. The reason it is integrated like this is because it has features that both types of players like. It's better to have a server that has both modes, so the community is bigger and the wilderness is always packed. *Fun PK area (keep items when you die). *PK Rating system. *Full working mage bank *Active wilderness.
[B]The Owner:[/B] The owners name is Danny. He knows what he's doing and almost the entire base was scripted by himself. He has a natural talent for RSPS programming and can make virtually anything and implement it into this server. He is a community-friendly administrator and listens to new ideas from players. Danny can come up with great ideas, including a never before seen minigame called Last Man Standing, which is a personal favorite to many. He isn't lazy when it comes to updating the server. He can fix bugs quickly and come out with new content on a regular basis. He isn't an owner who leeches things, although some ideas may come off of other tutorials, but all of his updates are unique and come with great quality.
[B]What features will I get for becomming a donator?[/b]
There is a massive range of benefits for donators here are some of them:
[list] [/list] [LIST=1] [*]Cheaper items in the battle reward store [*]Green chat text in game and yell [*]Access to donator part of city (See below) [*]Special attack restores quicker [*]Access to new shops (see below) [*]Access to new monsters and cities [/list]
Trimmed skillcape store (Better stats than normal skillcapes) [img]http://i47.tinypic.com/2s7ugep.png[/img]
These are just some of the many benefits donators get, there will be many more in the future we promise you that.
That not enough, want more? Then become a Hydrascape Platinum Donator!
What are the features of being a platinum donator?
[LIST=1] [*]Max levels get increased to 102 instead of 99, meaning you can reach 130 combat [*]Unlocks /goto command so you can /goto any player you want to (teleports you to a player) [*]unlocks /openshop command, so you can open any shop anywhere without having to travel anywhere [*]unlocks /bankall command which will send all your items to your bank [*]Unlocks /prison command [*][B][COLOR="#A9A9A9"]Silver bold chat text in game and yell[/COLOR][/B] [*]All the perks of donator [*]Better rewards from the GIFT system [*]Access to special platinum drop parties at christmas and other holidays[/ul]
[B][COLOR="Red"]You may have to be registered to see content below![/COLOR][/B]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/21dq2hi.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.synthex-pk.net/forum.php"]Click here to visit the forums![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33eifls.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.synthex-pk.net/?pageid=playnow"]Click here to play the webclient![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/33eifls.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.synthex-pk.net/?pageid=playnow"]Click here to download the client![/URL]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/e5l0eg.gif[/img][URL=http://"http://www.synthex-pk.net/highscore.php"]Click here to view the highscores![/URL]
[IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/33m7pso.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.synthex-pk.net/showthread.php?212-The-Newcomers-Guide-Made-by-jack"]Click here to view the newcommers guide![/URL]
[IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/wsd3p.png[/img][URL=http://"http://www.synthex-pk.net/index.php?pageid=drops"]Click here to view the drop database![/URL]
[B]Custom Home[/B] [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/customhome.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/location.gif[/img] The unique home of SyntheX PK. All stores are located within this small city. You will find almost everything you need at this location.
[IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/menu1.gif[/img] The above menu has most teleports to monsters and other locations. You can go to all bosses through this tab, even basic monsters, and even to all minigames.
[B]Money Making/Skilling[/B] [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/moneymakingandskill.gif[/img]
The above location is where you gain those skilling points. Skilling is one of the best ways to make money and gain some rare items if you choose to buy mystery boxes with your skill points. You can train thieving, firemaking, fishing, and woodcutting all at this location. You can buy other items such as ores, logs, bars, and other things will skilling points. Some rewards are goldsmith gauntlets, cooking gauntlets, dragon pickaxe (mines x2 the ore), and mystery boxes.
Skilling is one of the best ways to gain cash on SyntheX PK, if you have a high level. Other good ways to gain cash is by killing NPC's, as drops are very rewarding. The forums have a special drop database to see which NPC drops what.
[IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/acheiv.gif[/img]
An extra way to earn cash is through the achievement tab. You complete certain tasks for a GP reward.
[B]ZombiesX[/B] [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/zombies.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/1zxcv4.png[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/27zgg7s.png[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/5dpe0n.png[/img]
Zombies is the most popular minigame here at SyntheX-PK, where waves are never ending and more and more zombies appear at the higher level you compete at. This game can take quite awhile, so once you join, plan to play it hours on end! It's very addicting and can be a good source of cash if you spend your points wisely.
[B]Last Man Standing[/B] [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/lms.gif[/img]
Last Man Standing is an all out battle between you and everyone else. In this minigame you are a lone soldier fighting your way to be the last man alive. It's basically free for all, and the rewards are the same as the one's for battle. A quick way to get here is by typing /lms.
[B]Battle Minigame[/B] [IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/battle.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/219dguv.png[/img]
Battle is fun minigame with great rewards. In this minigame, you have to complete 11 full waves to earn the maximum amount of points. It can be difficult if you don't have good enough stats/armor. It is recommended to have at least 60 prayer and have a decent combat level. This game can be a good source of cash if you spend your points wisely and if you play it quite often.
[IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/shopping.gif[/img] The main place to shop if you don't like to explore.
[IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/pkmenus.gif[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/sm3uzb.png[/img] These menus show your current kill/death ratio, as well as how many PK Points you have, and you can go to numerous PK'ing spots through this menu.
[IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/giftbox.gif[/img]
The gift box can be rewarding at times. You get 1 gift every hour that you are logged in. These do give mystery boxes which you can get rare items from them. This is just a basic incentive for playing.
[IMG]http://i1339.photobucket.com/albums/o702/Garrett_Stoegbauer/votingrewards.gif[/img]
Voting benefits the server, and can benefit you if you do it everyday. You can buy these cool items for voting tickets. Vote once a day. Voting every day will get it to the top of the toplist, and also will increase growth of players on SyntheX PK.
[/CENTER]

item.title: SyntheX PK - Ultimate RS Emulator [PK Server AND Economy Server]
item.dc:creator: @xEvilGSx xEvilGSx
item.description:
@xEvilGSx wrote:

Not sure about that. It was shut down by Jagex last year, if that’s what you mean? But it’s back and has that all sorted out so it will not happen again.

Read full topic

item.title: SyntheX PK - Ultimate RS Emulator [PK Server AND Economy Server]
item.dc:creator: @xEvilGSx xEvilGSx
item.description:
@xEvilGSx wrote:

[ul][list][CENTER]

What makes SyntheX PK unique?
SyntheX PK is both an Economy and PK based server. The server was last known as HydraScape and is managed and owned by Danny. Every skill is working except farming and agility. These skills will be released in the near future. There is all sorts of minigames that you can try out and earn rewards from, plus a never before seen home area. Hydrascape was once the most played RSPS, with nearly 400+ people on regulary at all times throughout the day, and at night. New on SyntheX PK is an all new skilling point reward system. For each skill you train, you will gain points. You can spend these points on various items, including a mystery box. The mystery box can give out a rare item if your lucky. All in all, the server has a decent xp rate, not to quick, and not to slow. Remember the game should be a challenge, and if you just want to get those quick stats to 99, choose PK Mode!

SyntheX PK also has a wonderful staff. They are always willing to help out with updates, and are great at communicating with the community. They are fairly active and put players who need help, first.

Danny
Tazo
Totts
Matt
Rage Inside

PK Mode and Adventurer Mode
When you first create an account on SyntheX PK, you are required to decide between two different modes. PK Mode is for people who love to PK. You will be able to train your combat skills at a faster rate then you would in Adventurer mode. Your skills are not recorded on the highscores. When you select Adventurer mode, you’re stats will be saved to the highscores, and it is more of a challenge to train your skills. Some skills are easy, others are more difficult. The reason it is integrated like this is because it has features that both types of players like. It’s better to have a server that has both modes, so the community is bigger and the wilderness is always packed.
*Fun PK area (keep items when you die).
*PK Rating system.
*Full working mage bank
*Active wilderness.

The Owner:
The owners name is Danny. He knows what he’s doing and almost the entire base was scripted by himself. He has a natural talent for RSPS programming and can make virtually anything and implement it into this server. He is a community-friendly administrator and listens to new ideas from players. Danny can come up with great ideas, including a never before seen minigame called Last Man Standing, which is a personal favorite to many. He isn’t lazy when it comes to updating the server. He can fix bugs quickly and come out with new content on a regular basis. He isn’t an owner who leeches things, although some ideas may come off of other tutorials, but all of his updates are unique and come with great quality.

What features will I get for becomming a donator?

There is a massive range of benefits for donators here are some of them:

[list]
[/list]
[LIST=1]
[]Cheaper items in the battle reward store
[]Green chat text in game and yell
[]Access to donator part of city (See below)
[]Special attack restores quicker
[]Access to new shops (see below)
[]Access to new monsters and cities
[/list]

Trimmed skillcape store (Better stats than normal skillcapes)

These are just some of the many benefits donators get, there will be many more in the future we promise you that.

That not enough, want more? Then become a Hydrascape Platinum Donator!

What are the features of being a platinum donator?

[LIST=1]
[]Max levels get increased to 102 instead of 99, meaning you can reach 130 combat
[]Unlocks /goto command so you can /goto any player you want to (teleports you to a player)
[]unlocks /openshop command, so you can open any shop anywhere without having to travel anywhere
[]unlocks /bankall command which will send all your items to your bank
[]Unlocks /prison command
[][COLOR="#A9A9A9"]Silver bold chat text in game and yell[/COLOR]
[]All the perks of donator
[]Better rewards from the GIFT system
[*]Access to special platinum drop parties at christmas and other holidays[/ul]

[COLOR=“Red”]You may have to be registered to see content below![/COLOR]

Click here to visit the forums!

Click here to play the webclient!

Click here to download the client!

Click here to view the highscores!

Click here to view the newcommers guide!

Click here to view the drop database!

Custom Home


The unique home of SyntheX PK. All stores are located within this small city. You will find almost everything you need at this location.


The above menu has most teleports to monsters and other locations. You can go to all bosses through this tab, even basic monsters, and even to all minigames.

Money Making/Skilling

The above location is where you gain those skilling points. Skilling is one of the best ways to make money and gain some rare items if you choose to buy mystery boxes with your skill points. You can train thieving, firemaking, fishing, and woodcutting all at this location. You can buy other items such as ores, logs, bars, and other things will skilling points. Some rewards are goldsmith gauntlets, cooking gauntlets, dragon pickaxe (mines x2 the ore), and mystery boxes.

Skilling is one of the best ways to gain cash on SyntheX PK, if you have a high level. Other good ways to gain cash is by killing NPC’s, as drops are very rewarding. The forums have a special drop database to see which NPC drops what.

An extra way to earn cash is through the achievement tab. You complete certain tasks for a GP reward.

ZombiesX

zombies.gif769×504



Zombies is the most popular minigame here at SyntheX-PK, where waves are never ending and more and more zombies appear at the higher level you compete at. This game can take quite awhile, so once you join, plan to play it hours on end! It’s very addicting and can be a good source of cash if you spend your points wisely.

Last Man Standing

lms.gif773×507

Last Man Standing is an all out battle between you and everyone else. In this minigame you are a lone soldier fighting your way to be the last man alive. It’s basically free for all, and the rewards are the same as the one’s for battle. A quick way to get here is by typing /lms.

Battle Minigame

battle.gif774×510

Battle is fun minigame with great rewards. In this minigame, you have to complete 11 full waves to earn the maximum amount of points. It can be difficult if you don’t have good enough stats/armor. It is recommended to have at least 60 prayer and have a decent combat level. This game can be a good source of cash if you spend your points wisely and if you play it quite often.


The main place to shop if you don’t like to explore.



These menus show your current kill/death ratio, as well as how many PK Points you have, and you can go to numerous PK’ing spots through this menu.

The gift box can be rewarding at times. You get 1 gift every hour that you are logged in. These do give mystery boxes which you can get rare items from them. This is just a basic incentive for playing.

Voting benefits the server, and can benefit you if you do it everyday. You can buy these cool items for voting tickets. Vote once a day. Voting every day will get it to the top of the toplist, and also will increase growth of players on SyntheX PK.

[/CENTER]

Read full topic
item.source: SyntheX PK - Ultimate RS Emulator [PK Server AND Economy Server]
